title: Proposal to reduce the mining revenue of Golff Farm（关于Golff Farm挖矿收益减少的提案）
body:
The current output of Golff Farm liquidity mining is 125,000 tokens per week, and the output of GOF still needs to be reduced. This reflects the scarcity of GOF while supporting the GOF secondary market. This can reduce the negative impact of some mining and selling users on GOF. In order to better protect the interests of current currency holders and benefit the long-term development of the Golff financial ecosystem, it is recommended that after the fifth round of Farm mining begins, the current mining output speed of Farm should be adjusted, and the weekly mining output should be adjusted to 11 10,000 pieces, a 12% reduction in production. 
现有Golff Farm挖矿产出为每周12.5万枚，仍需继续减少GOF的产出，这体现了GOF稀缺性的同时去给GOF二级市场做支撑。这能减少部分挖卖提用户对GOF的负面影响。为更好地保障当前持币用户的利益并且有利于Golff金融生态的长期发展，建议在第五轮Farm挖矿开始后，调整现有Farm挖矿产出速度，调整每周挖矿产出量为11万枚，减产了12%。

At the same time, it is recommended that the number of mining pools in the fifth round remains at 5. In order to ensure the liquidity of GOF and encourage users to participate in Golff Vault products, Uni-V2 (GOF-ETH), GDAI, GYCRV and the top 2 tokens in the community vote enter the fifth round (2 weeks) of Golff Farm mining. Conducive to the long-term profitability of the Golff project. Among them, the two mining pools voted by users submit candidates by pledge 5000GOF, and the community users vote to determine. Mining pool quota allocation: the community voted for the top 2 tokens and GToken tokens. The incentive for each mining pool is 20,000 per week, and the incentive for Uni-V2 (GOF-ETH) is 30,000 per week.
同时建议第五轮的矿池数量仍然保持为5个。为保证GOF的流动性以及激励用户参与Golff Vault产品，Uni-V2(GOF-ETH)、GDAI、GYCRV和社区投票票数排名前2的代币进入Golff Farm第五轮（2周）挖矿，这有利于Golff项目的长期盈利。其中票选的两个矿池名额由用户通过质押5000GOF提交候选人，并由社区用户投票决定。矿池额度分配：社区票选前2名的代币和GToken代币每个矿池的激励为每周2万个，Uni-V2(GOF-ETH)的激励为每周3万个。
choices: Agree to the proposal（同意提案）
Objection to the proposal（反对提案）
author: 0xEdba3A794B15880659b4459E02350C1c73cE2375
